trans-unit.source: Provides a file system implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de sistema de arquivos da classe <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class implements the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract` base class to return file system resources for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> classe implementa o <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> `abstract` classe para retornar os recursos do sistema de arquivo de base de <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> classe.

trans-unit.source: Client applications do not create <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> instances directly; instead, they are created by calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method on a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: Não criar aplicativos cliente <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> instâncias diretamente; em vez disso, eles são criados chamando o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> método em um <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance that provides read-only access to a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.IO.Stream> instância que fornece acesso somente leitura a um recurso do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class relies on the <xref:System.IO.File> class for error handling and code access security.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> classe depende de <xref:System.IO.File> classe para tratamento de erros e segurança de acesso ao código.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que contém as informações necessárias para serializar a nova instância <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> class that contains the source of the serialized stream associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que contém a origem do fluxo serializado associado à nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> class from the specified instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> das instâncias especificadas das classes <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> e <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> a interface para o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> classe.

trans-unit.source: Closes the response stream.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o fluxo de resposta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> method cleans up the resources used by a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> and closes the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> método limpa os recursos usados por um <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> e fecha o fluxo de resposta ao chamar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de resposta deve ser fechado para evitar a falta de recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: You can closes the response stream by calling either <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
trans-unit.target: Você pode fechar o fluxo de resposta chamando <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> method to close the response stream.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> método para fechar o fluxo de resposta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the content in the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento do conteúdo no recurso de sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes returned from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes retornados do recurso do sistema do arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> property contains the length, in bytes, of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> propriedade contém o comprimento, em bytes, o recurso do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> property to obtain the content length of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> propriedade para obter o comprimento do conteúdo do recurso de sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de conteúdo do recurso de sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The value "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: O valor "binário/octet-stream".

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> property contains the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> propriedade contém o tipo de conteúdo do recurso de sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> is always "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> é sempre "binário/octet-stream".

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> property to obtain the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> propriedade para obter o tipo de conteúdo do recurso de sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> a ser preenchido com dados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que especifica o destino dessa serialização.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Popula um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos incluídos no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> automaticamente são rastreadas e serializado pelo formatador.

trans-unit.source: Returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o fluxo de dados do recurso do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for reading data from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> para ler dados do recurso do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> método retorna o fluxo de dados do recurso do sistema do arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de resposta deve ser fechado para evitar a falta de recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The response stream can be closed by calling <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de resposta pode ser fechado chamando <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method to return the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> método para retornar o fluxo de dados do recurso do sistema do arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de pares de nome/valor do cabeçalho associados à resposta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> that contains the header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> que contém os pares de nome/valor de cabeçalho associados à resposta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A> property contains two name/value pairs, one for content length and one for content type, both of which are also exposed as properties, <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A> propriedade contém pares nome/valor de dois, uma para o comprimento do conteúdo e um tipo de conteúdo, que também são expostos como propriedades, <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> e <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A> property to retrieve the name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A> propriedade para recuperar os pares de nome/valor associados à resposta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o URI do recurso de sistema de arquivos que forneceu a resposta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que contém o URI do recurso de sistema de arquivo que forneceu a resposta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A> property contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A> propriedade contém o URI do recurso de sistema de arquivo que forneceu a resposta.

trans-unit.source: This is always the file system resource that was requested.
trans-unit.target: Isso é sempre o recurso do sistema de arquivo que foi solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A> to retrieve the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A> para recuperar o URI do recurso de sistema de arquivo que forneceu a resposta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> property is supported by the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> tem suporte pela instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> property is supported by the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se o <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> propriedade é suportada pela <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instância; caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: This property is always true for [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é sempre true para [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> , which will hold the serialized data for the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />, que conterá os dados serializados para o <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> containing the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que contém o destino do fluxo serializado associado ao novo <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: Popula uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar o <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.
